row1.title: Cross talk
row1.desc: CROSS TALK is a Tamil language Thriller Short Film written and Directed by Ramanan, Starring Dhanvant and Srivatsan in prominent roles and the Female lead played by Thanmaya.

row1.title: Cameo
row1.desc: CAMEO is a silent short film Written and Directed by Mohana Ramanan(DMR) and performed by Hemshyam, Spoorthi

row2.title: DUPE
row2.desc: DUPE is a Tamil Thriller short film starring Sibi, Ramanan, Divyesh, Madesh. This film is a pure work of confusion. If you don’t understand the film mean that the film worked for you.

row2.title: UNNODU NADANTHA
row2.desc: Dev and Yazhini’s journey dances in whispers and silences, weaving the essence of their unspoken bond. A story that transcends words, stay tuned
